item.title: Senior Java Backend Engineer (m/f) for FinReach at FinReach GmbH (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
We’re currently looking for a Senior Java Backend Engineer (m/f) to join our strong product & engineering team of 12 and counting. For more information visit our website: www.finreach.com.


Your Role & Responsibilities



  • You deliver feature complete product increments, working on the Back-end (microservice)  components of our products, making them better performing and more user friendly;

  • You take ownership over specific system components while proactively and continuously improving them;

  • You participate in the maintenance of our CI/CD infrastructure together with your team-members;

  • You push automatically tested code into production on a daily basis as part of our continuous delivery pipeline;

  • You thrive for pragmatic perfection, paying attention to the details of security, scalability, performance and fault-tolerance;

  • You’re eager to learn, are passionate about technology and happy to improve existing products and processes;

  • You’re motivated to serve and guide teammates towards common success.


Our Perfect Match



  • University degree in Computer Science or a similar Engineering field;

  • Min. 3 years Java/Spring professional experience (Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Spring Data, Spring Integration, Spring MVC) with some knowledge of UI frameworks (preferably React/Redux);

  • Strong Object-Oriented analysis and design skills, and abilities to design and implement complex algorithms to deliver architectural components and business functions;

  • Strong knowledge of Software Design Patterns;

  • You love to solve complex problems and are able to optimize competing priorities;

  • Very good communication skills with a high English proficiency;

  • You’re interested in one of the following fields:


    • Data analysis with Python, Numpy, Pandas;

    • DevOps with Ansible/Saltstack or similar.



About Us



  • Our current Java stack: Java 8, Spring 4 (Boot, MVC, Data), Junit, MongoDB, MySQL, Elasticsearch, Maven, Git, Travis CI, Ansible CM;

  • Currently many of our interfaces are using AngularJS;

  • Additionally we have a Ruby stack (Ruby on Rails);

  • Our team is fun, talented, international and experienced mix of engineers and entrepreneurs;

  • We believe the success and growth of our colleagues is directly tied to the success of the company;

  • We’ll support you in relocation, getting a work permit and other administrative issues if needed;

  • We believe hard work and success deserve to be celebrated—both in and out of the office.

item.title: Help us as Engineering Lead become the standard for personalized audio at Mimi Hearing Technologies GmbH (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
We’re looking for an engineering lead with a passion for audio technology and leading software engineering teams. As our engineering lead you will professionalize and build out the engineering team and processes while we continue to grow. A core part of this role will be to drive the further development of our technologies and products together with our product, design and research leads.


Will you fit our culture?


At Mimi we pride ourselves in the amazing team we have built. A team that amplifies connections; both within our team, and for our users. A team with a strong and diverse culture, loving and respecting towards everyone’s individual strengths but also their imperfections. We are solving a real problem through strong emergent leadership and ownership; proactively seeking out challenges, tackling them boldly and inspiring everyone involved.


We commit to create a culture which nourishes personal growth as a basis for company growth. We are a learning organisation; we love to work with people who take initiative. We encourage failing in order to learn. We don’t wait to get to the perfect solution, but ask for feedback early.


This can be your workplace


As one of the most promising startups in this field, Mimi is developing a data driven experience that tests your ears, protects your ears, and adjusts sound to your ears. Our mission is to integrate our sound personalization technology into all existing audio products and services. As a large step towards that mission we’re launching a bluetooth headphone beginning of Sept 2017 with a leading headphone manufacturer. This headphone will have Mimi’s processing running directly their CSR chip. Additionally we’ve built a service for Android and iOS audio streaming, and are working on products for speakers, car manufacturers and several other verticals. This means our technology needs to work both for the end-user and be enterprise grade.


The Mimi team is a diverse group of ~30 innovators with strong expertise in audio engineering, hearing science, product development, business design and communications. Joining the team means you‘ll get the chance to help shape a truly innovative product in a budding market. This is a chance to help build up a world-class engineering team.


Our company is self-organized through Holacracy which means clear structures and processes, high transparency, and distributed authority.


As our engineering lead you will:



  • Lead, inspire, and grow our excellent software engineering team that builds, implements, and maintains Mimi’s products.

  • Not only optimize your own code but make sure our engineers are able to optimize theirs.

  • Provide technical leadership, contributing to our product, technology and IP strategies.

  • Establish engineering best practices (from TDD to QA) through solid design decisions, processes and tools.

  • Assess new technologies and make pragmatic choices that help guide us towards a long-term vision.


It would be great if you:



  • Have great interpersonal skills, deep technical ability, and a portfolio of successful execution.

  • Have strong organization and prioritization skills as well as outstanding written and verbal communication skills.

  • Have a proven track record of working towards strategic goals in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. You have the wisdom to know when to shift priorities.

  • Have experience with IP-protection in a B2B-licensing environment.

  • Have an open, curious, and bold approach to problem-solving and recognise the best solution is often not the first one that comes to mind.

  • Are still a great individual contributor. You’re not afraid of code.

  • Have 5-10 years software development experience, 2-5 years leading experience


Requirements:



  • Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Audio Engineering, related technical field or equivalent practical experience.

  • Experience leading software engineering teams.

  • Experience with architecting complex systems. Experience with software development.

item.title: Engineering Lead - Frontend at Zalando Lounge (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
YOU ARE READY TO MAKE AN IMPACT


Zalando Lounge is an online shopping club for fashion and lifestyle products in 11 European countries. We offer our members daily, time-limited sale campaigns with discounts of up to 75% off the recommended retail price. However,  Zalando Lounge is so much more than discounts. Our strength lies in our focus on fashion: from sought-after labels to niche brands, from famous international names to trendy luxury brands, we make sure to meet the fashion taste of all our customers, who are always on the hunt for the best products at the best prices. Working with our brand partners, we're pioneering innovative supply-chain and production processes and offer them an impactful and smart solution, creating a new way to shop for fashion - and a new way to sell.


Our Tech department builds and drives our own customer facing applications and services on top of Zalando’s platform services. We have a strong focus on customer experience and learn and experiment how we can engage  them even more.


As an Engineering Lead for our frontend team at Zalando Lounge in Berlin you will be in charge of creating an attractive webshop by driving and challenging the development of new product features and ensuring a highly efficient and performant customer-facing webshop. Furthermore your role as an Engineering Lead at Zalando Lounge will directly impact the growth and overall tech vision of the business.



YOU ARE SETTING STANDARDS


Delivery: You easily find your way and lead your teams through completing the transition from our legacy system to a modern tech stack, creating new product features and ensuring high availability and scalability of our webshop.


Vision: You develop and execute mid- and long-term technical visions and architecture with your teams, while closely aligning with Product Managers, UX Designers and other Engineering Leads to be in line with the overall tech strategy.


Collaboration: You facilitate collaboration between different engineering teams and align with the Zalando Fashion store on future frontend strategies and tech stacks.


Impact: Ensure the overall company expansion by creating a scalable architecture and achieving technical resilience of the webshop to high traffic.


Growth: You attract and retain diverse talents and act as key contributor in developing overall technical skills by working one-on-one with Javascript Engineers of Zalando Lounge. Furthermore, you promote forward-thinking engineering practices, high code-quality standards and a strong feedback culture across your teams.



YOU ARE SKILLED


Experience: 5+ years experience and at least 2+ years working on customer-facing applications, working hands-on with pure Javascript and modern tech stacks, such as React and Node. You are also experienced in working with and connecting to backend APIs. For more information check out our Tech Radar.


Leadership: Leading, developing and mentoring an international team of software engineers, having 3+ years of experience as a team lead working on high-traffic applications in an agile way.


Passionate: In topics around customer-facing products and being able on having a high impact on shaping the product as a whole of a rapidly expanding business.



YOU ARE OFFERED


Culture. A workplace where trust, empowerment and feedback are valued; 100+ internal guilds; tech talks; product demos; coder dojos.


Perks. Competitive salary; great shopping discount on a wide range of products on zalando.com; discounts from external partners; public transport discounts; relocation assistance for internationals; municipality services; flexible working times; additional holidays & volunteering time off; diverse sports and health offerings.


Development. Extensive onboarding; personal branding support focused on leadership; opportunity to attend and speak at conferences.


Peers. International, accomplished experts and self-organized, autonomous teams



WANT TO JOIN US?


Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!


If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring process, please contact our recruiter Antonia Samanns.

item.title: Senior Python Backend Engineer - Turn trips into amazing experiences! at GetYourGuide AG (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
We are looking for a motivated Senior Python Backend Engineer to help develop the next generation of our in-house systems in the realm of Search Engine Marketing (SEM).  You will work as part of a cross-functional mission team with top-notch developers, analysts, data scientists and product owners as co-workers.  Deep dive data, develop innovative solutions, lead architecture decisions and take our marketing systems to new heights!


About GetYourGuide:


With 400 employees from 50 nationalities, GetYourGuide is on a mission to turn trips into amazing experiences, using our product and technology to change the way travelers find and book things to do and explore their destination. We connect these travelers to our vast catalog of amazing experiences through our online marketplace.


Marketing Technology Team Mission:


This team is part of the Performance Marketing department and responsible for our core systems related to account structure, audience management/remarketing and targeting dimensions (geo, location, device, language) for search and display channels.  We aim to be at the cutting edge of ad technology developing, testing and automating systems across our channels.  We have touch points with various departments and aim to solve problems at scale with systems that manage 10s of millions of ads.


Responsibilities:



  • Immerse yourself in our Marketing and Technology Stack

  • Lead architecture discussions and develop next-generation systems

  • Partner with our business and technical teams to deliver innovative solutions

  • Review ongoing SEM efforts, identify opportunities and explore new areas

  • Design and develop efficient solutions that can continue to scale

  • Continuously improve our code base, systems and processes

  • Mentor other team members and be involved with hiring


Requirements:



  • Minimum of 5+ years of software development experience

  • Highly proficient in backend Python coding, best practices and libraries

  • Experience with the architecture and deployment of complex systems

  • Ability to turn ideas into fast, reliable and maintainable code

  • Solid understanding of SQL including complex queries and optimization

  • Positive, pro-active team player who is passionate about their craft

  • Customer-centric prioritization and data drive decision making

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English


Nice to have:



  • Experience with large scale data processing using Apache Spark

  • Developed against advertising APIs (Google Adwords, Facebook, etc.)

  • Prior experience with advertising technology or remarketing

  • Prior experience in start-up environments


We Offer:



  • Work on a product that helps create memorable travel experiences

  • Smart, engaged co-workers

  • Speak English in the office with people from over 50 nationalities

  • Virtual stock options - be part of our success story

  • Quarterly Hackathons and weekly tech talks

  • Annual external training budget - be constantly learning

  • Well stocked kitchen and our famous pizza & beer Friday’s

  • GetYourGuide vouchers and free German lessons

  • Relocation Assistance


Curious?


Do you have the skills for the job, enthusiasm about our vision and fit our culture? We are already looking forward to hearing from you! If you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.


In the meantime, you can check our blog to see what happens behind the scenes at GetYourGuide and check out Tech Radar for an insight into the stack we use to turn trips into amazing experiences!

item.title: Senior Backend Engineer (GO, Java or Scala) at Zalando Lounge (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
YOU ARE READY TO MAKE AN IMPACT


Zalando Lounge is an online shopping club for fashion and lifestyle products in 11 European countries. We offer our members daily, time-limited sale campaigns with discounts of up to 75% off the recommended retail price. However,  Zalando Lounge is so much more than discounts. Our strength lies in our focus on fashion: from sought-after labels to niche brands, from famous international names to trendy luxury brands, we make sure to meet the fashion taste of all our customers, who are always on the hunt for the best products at the best prices. Working with our brand partners, we're pioneering innovative supply-chain and production processes and offer them an impactful and smart solution, creating a new way to shop for fashion - and a new way to sell.


Our Tech department builds and drives our own customer facing applications and internal services on top of Zalando’s platform services. item.title: Frontend Developer (AngularJS) at LE Commsulting GmbH (Berlin, Deutschland)

item.title: Machine Learning Engineer (m/f) at HelloFresh (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
At HelloFresh, we want to change the way people eat. Over the past 5 years we've seen this mission spread beyond our wildest dreams. So, how did we do it? Our weekly recipe boxes full of exciting recipes and lovingly sourced, fresh ingredients have blossomed into a community of inspired, energised home cooks that expands across the globe. Now we're the fastest growing company in Europe, active and growing in 9 different countries across 3 continents.


Our story started in Berlin. As Europe’s tech hub, and the home of our global headquarters, it’s a dynamic, progressive environment where innovation is nurtured and promoted. Since we started, we’ve worked exceptionally hard and we’ve received almost US$ 300 million in investment which together have allowed us to create an award winning product.



As a member of HelloTech you’ll be exposed to a modern technology stack and a slick cross functional agile team setup. We have developed a refined product and provide scalability on a global level. Join our HelloTech team and help us to build a fresh food global champion!


About the job


HelloFresh Data Science is an interdisciplinary team that designs, implements and maintains state of the art machine learning models to automate and optimize marketing, operations, logistics and customer experience.  We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer who is excited about turning innovative ideas into powerful data driven products.  Working closely with the data scientist and engineers on the team you will help bringing these ideas into reality and improve the e-commerce experience of millions of customers around the globe.


To succeed in this role, you’ll need a hunger for discovering information in massive amounts of data, an attitude towards experimentation and fluency in machine learning techniques and software engineering best practices.


As machine learning engineer you will be responsible for 



  • Solving challenging business problems by deploying state-of- the-art machine learning pipelines in production

  • Ensuring availability, performance and scalability of our machine learning and data processing platform

  • Collaborating with data scientists and business stakeholders to discover innovative ways of using vast repositories of user generated data


Who we’re looking for



  • A proven track record implementing data driven products and a broad understanding of the state of the art in machine learning

  • A passion for using and developing open source software and a solid programming background ideally in Python and Pyspark

  • Experience with storage models coming from the SQL (PostgresSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (Elasticsearch, Redis) space as well as data streaming (Kinesis, Kafka) and columnar databases (BigQuery)

  • Experience in using Docker containers and configuration management systems such as Ansible/ Fabric / Puppet.

  • Experience in Hadoop technologies such as Hive / Impala and distributed data pipelines such as Airflow / Luigi

  • Sense of ownership: you take responsibility for your projects and pride in your work:


What we offer



  • The opportunity to get into one of the most intellectually demanding roles at one of the largest technology companies in Europe

  • Cutting edge technology, allowing you to work with state-of-the-art tools and software solutions

  • Competitive compensation and plenty of room for personal growth

  • Great international exposure and team atmosphere

  • Work in a modern, spacious office in the heart of Berlin with excellent transport links and employee perks


Are you up for a challenge?


Please submit your complete application by using this link including your earliest starting date.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - Machine Learning Expert (m/f) at MYTOYS GROUP (Berlin, Germany)

The MYTOYS Group with headquarters in Berlin belongs to the Otto Group and is the leading European e-commerce company with a focus on families. In addition to myToys, our online store for toys and children's products, the MYTOYS GROUP includes the brands mirapodo, one of the largest online shoe shops in Germany, the ladies fashion online store ambellis, the home and living specialist yomonda as well as limango, Germany's leading shopping community for women and young families.


At the MYTOYS GROUP employees get everything they need to help them embark on a successful career, including interesting entry and career opportunities in the high growth e-commerce market.



Be part of our new Data Science team and have a major impact on the user experience of millions of myToys customers, helping them find the most relevant results for their searches in a faster way.


We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist - Machine Learning Expert (m/f) who will apply and develop cutting-edge algorithms to determine the optimal choice and the best ranking of a large number of product categories and articles, applying explorative, descriptive and predictive data analysis.



Job requirements:



  • A successfully completed M.Sc. or Ph.D. degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Software Engineering or a similar discipline

  • More than 3 years’ experience working in a machine learning, data analysis or recommender systems environment

  • Proficient in SQL and in either R or Python

  • An exceptionally analytical mind-set, with the ability to handle and draw insights from large amounts of data

  • Fluent English

item.title: Software Engineer - Front End (React) at Chegg, Inc (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
Your goal – to improve the education process and better the lives of students -- through engineering.


As an front-end engineer on our Writing Tools team, you will join a small, accomplished team building software to help students become better writers.  Our stack is React with Redux on the front-end, PHP, Ruby, & Elixir on the back-end.


Organization: Writing Tools


The goal of the Writing Tools Team is to provide students with effective writing solutions to better their academic careers. Currently composed of 4 of the largest student citation services in the world - EasyBib.com, citationmachine.net, bibme.org, and citethisforme.com, the team reaches students from all over the world. The sites each have millions of unique visitors a year (almost 30 million combined) and has the potential to make a broad impact on students’ lives throughout the world.


Role:


Engineers play an integral part of the Chegg Writing Services team. Citations play a crucial role in students’ writing process, proven by the thousands of schools who have registered to use EasyBib. As a requirement of any academic writing, citations also service the needs of creators of content, by offering credit where credit is due.


Students struggle with the citations process, and Chegg offers fast and accurate solutions to this problem. Our sites reach almost 30 million users a year and reach students at all grade levels. The Chegg family consists of 4 of the largest online citation services in the world. The role will create and improve existing backend services fueling all of our citation services.


We develop multiple products in parallel, in small dedicated teams. We are proud to work on high-quality code using modern development methods and technologies. Continuous integration and delivery, automated tests and quick development turnarounds are cornerstones of our development agenda.


The ideal candidate likes to think outside the box, is interested in constantly improving themselves and their team by education and feedback, and wants to give back some of their work to an open source community. They love tackling new problems, deploying frequently, thinking on their feet, and coming up with new ideas.


Responsibilities:



  • Working in a small development team to maintain current and implement new features

  • Build efficient, clean and reusable React components

  • Participate in feature discussions, code, and design reviews


Requirements:                  



  • Several years experience writing modern JavaScript

  • Experience with React, Redux and automated testing with Jest

  • Active interest not only in application code but also great software architecture

  • Great communicator both verbal and written

  • Must be a team player and work well in a team environment


Preferred:



  • Experience working with large scale REST and/or graphQL API’s

  • Knowledge of performance optimization approaches and technologies for web applications

  • Experience with back-end technologies such as PHP, Ruby, or Elixir

you:

item.title: Senior PHP Developer (m/f) at Urban Sports GmbH (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
Urban Sports Club is an online-based sports club that provides an all-inclusive membership for sports venues across the city. With a single monthly subscription customers can do sports at more than 1000 studios offering more than 40 different types of sports and thousands of activities every week. So why not fitness on Monday, yoga on Tuesday, climbing on Wednesday, tennis on Thursday, martial arts on Friday, team sports on Saturday and on Sunday have a message and relax at one of the many saunas? Use the Urban Sports app to check in at our partner venues and get access to the greatest sports offer you can get.


We are currently active in more than 10 cities and are continuously expanding to other cities.
To strengthen our team, we are searching for a Senior PHP Developer (m/f) for our Berlin office.



About the role



The Senior PHP Developer role is located in our office in Berlin and is an exciting opportunity to work in a team of passionate professionals who apply best practices of software development to build a well-specified, scalable product based on strongly modularized architecture, automated testing and deployment.


You will become a part of the core development team to design and develop complex web applications and new features for our platform. Adhering to agile development methodologies you will also ensure code quality and enforce best practices by communicating and sharing them to team members.


What we use



  • Phalcon, PHP 5/7, MVC, SOA

  • HTML5, CSS, Sass, jQuery, Ajax

  • PHPUnit, Behat, PHP CodeSniffer, phpDoc

  • REST API, JSON, SOAP

  • AWS, Debian, Vagrant, nginx

  • PostgreSQL, Redis, ElasticSearch

  • Git, Scrum


Your profile



  • You are familiar with keywords described as above

  • You successfully finished your academic studies in the field of computer sciences or equivalent professional experience

  • You have several years of experience in development with PHP5 frameworks, adhering to best practices in OOP, SOLID principles, design patters, clean code and testing

  • Experience with Phalcon PHP Framework is a plus

  • Excellent SQL knowledge, experience with PostgreSQL is a plus

  • Experience with ElasticSearch or another Lucene based search engine is a plus

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced software release environment

  • You are proactive, goal-oriented, self-motivated, reliable and have a structured way of working

  • You are fluent in English

  • Right to work in Germany

item.title: Senior Java Developer (Spring, PostgreSQL, Cassandra, AWS) at Zalando SE (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
You Are Ready To Make An Impact


As Zalando transforms from Europe’s leading e-commerce company into a multi-service platform for fashion, this is an exciting time to join us. As Senior Software Engineer, you’re part of a high performing team, building technologies that connect every part of the fashion industry.


We live Radical Agility, a methodology built on trust and backed by an architecture that lets us move fast while keeping complexity low. Open Source and InnerSource development is integral to our engineering practices and culture, supported at every level.


To keep Zalando’s competitive edge in the market we need to constantly improve our delivery and returns proposition. In Smart Delivery, the heart of Zalando Logistics, we know best how to bridge the last mile for our customers by offering the most convenient options to deliver their parcel anytime and anywhere. No parcels can leave Zalando warehouses without Smart Delivery Product hence our team has a long history within Zalando Logistics and direct impact on customer happiness.


You Are Setting Standards


Autonomy. At Zalando, you and your team will own your code and decide together on the technologies and tools to utilize as well operate high-performance applications on PaaS/SaaS cloud (preferably AWS).


Purpose. You and your team will work truly cross-functional with an entrepreneurial mindset and drive building new last mile services  for our customers and a robust carrier platform that allows new carriers to be integrated plug-and-play via our integration partners.


Expertise. You drive proofs of concept, pilots and technology evaluations to accelerate the onboarding of new technologies and solution designs.


You Are Skilled


Technologies. Significant expertise with Java 8 and related popular frameworks such as Spring. Additionally, as added bonus you have hands-on experience with NoSQL Databases: PostgreSQL and Cassandra. Check our Tech Radar for more information on the technologies we use.


Code Quality. Skilled in automated testing, high-performance code and complex server environments.


Ownership. You deliver high-performance, resilient and scalable distributed system landscape that handles large amounts of data while continuously enabling a high pace of change and innovation by working with your development and product team.


Knowledge Exchange. In contributing to our growing tech community and encouraging knowledge sharing in an agile work environment.


You Are Offered


Culture. Culture of trust, empowerment and feedback, 100+ internal guilds, tech talks, product demos, coder dojos. A dynamic, international team where collaboration is our core mindset.


Perks. Competitive salary, great shopping discount on a wide range of products on zalando.de and discounts from external partners.


Development. Personal branding support, opportunity to attend and speak at conferences.


Technologies. Opportunity to work with a range of different and cutting-edge technologies such as Kafka, AWS SQS, MySQL, Postgres, REdis, Cassandra, Spark, Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, Jenkins and Maven.


Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!!


If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring processes, please contact our recruiter Georg Petersen.

item.title: Senior Backend Engineer to create internal ERP system (Python/Java) at zLabels GmbH (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
YOU ARE READY TO MAKE AN IMPACT


At zLabels we create inspiring fashion brands for the online generation, such as mint&berry, Even&Odd, Zign and Kiomi. Our data-driven way of doing business means that our decisions are backed up by consumer behaviors and translate directly into relevant product selections. Developed for the digital market from day one, we’re confident to navigate the changing retail landscape and take pride in being always fast, always fresh.


To extend the reach of our fashion brands and enter new markets, we are building our own technical platform, such as our own system to manage stock and completing business transactions systems separate to the Zalando tech platform. Being a member of a tech department, consisting of about 30 engineers and product managers, this position will allow you to directly impact the business mission of zLabels. As Senior Backend Engineer (Java and/or Python) at zLabels you will create and maintain our  internal ERP system, which will support key business units in enhancing its performance through technology.



YOU ARE SETTING STANDARDS


Variety. Together with your team you will build, scale and continuously improve our ERP platform improving functional areas of the business such as Finance, Procurement, Logistics, Merchandising and Selling. These different areas demand a lot of integrations (with multiple systems) and tooling to improve the daily business.


Autonomy. Due to the size and startup-like set up of the tech team you will have the opportunity to decide together with your team on technical frameworks being used and have the opportunity to implement best practices whilst the team is growing.


Ownership. You are taking ownership of, and being responsible for providing strong technical architecture of the distributed systems that you will provide to key business units, such as Procurement, Finance or Logistics.


Excellence. Due to your business mindset you are continually thinking about new ways on how to help zLabels scale through a strong technical platform and synchronize it with distributed systems of the Zalando tech platform.



YOU ARE SKILLED


Experience. You have a strong background in working on and setting up ERPs and integrating them with multiple systems. You have also worked on creating architecture for technical solutions that have direct impact on the business scalability and profitability.


Technologies. Your preferred choice of coding hands-on is in Java and/or Python. You also have an understanding of APIs, REST, SOAP and have previously worked with distributed systems that  included CRM or ERP tools. Previous experience with AWS and Javascript is a plus. Check our Tech Radar for more information on the technologies we use.


Business mindset. You have a business mindset and are continuously thinking about new ways on how to improve zLabels through effective and strategic development of internal systems.


Knowledge Exchange. You will lead and mentor team members in terms of best practices, code quality and tech frameworks.



YOU ARE OFFERED


Culture. A workplace where trust, empowerment and feedback are valued, 100+ internal guilds, tech talks, product demos, coder dojos.


Perks. Competitive salary, great shopping discount on a wide range of products on zalando.com, discounts from external partners, public transport discounts, relocation assistance for internationals, municipality services, flexible working times, family service and parent & child rooms, additional holidays & volunteering time off, diverse sports and health offerings


Development. Extensive onboarding, personal branding support focused on leadership, opportunity to attend and speak at conferences.


Peers. International, accomplished experts and self-organized, autonomous teams.



WANT TO JOIN US?


Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!


If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring process, please contact our recruiter Antonia Samanns.

item.title: Senior Backend Engineer for Enterprise Systems (Java/Scala) at Zalando SE (Berlin, Deutschland)
item.description:
The Opportunity

Zalando Retail Operations Engineering builds and runs the systems for hundreds of buyers, analysts, and merchandisers. Together, they purchase fashion from our suppliers worth more than a billion euro each season. Zalando aims to bring the best fashion selection to its customers and Retail Operations drives the availability of high-quality retail merchandise, the speedy delivery from our supplier and efficient operation at scale. The engineering teams work closely with their users to ensure that our systems offer the best support and user experience. Our microservice-based architecture allows us to support complex business processes while staying flexible and developing in small, dedicated teams. Practices such as Inner Source and Domain-Driven Design ensure that we are staying aligned between teams without requiring the one grand upfront design.

Your Role



  • You create the technology that drives our business processes.

  • You develop a deep understanding of the business domain and its processes and share it with the team.

  • You drive the creation of system architectures that are flexible to support the evolving needs of business while ensuring high technical quality and operational stability.

  • You are keeping up to date with relevant technologies for modern enterprise systems and share your knowledge in the team and the larger Zalando tech community

  • You work in an agile environment and code with consistent quality that inspires your teammates



What You Can Offer



  • You are fluent in Java and/or Scala and relevant frameworks in those languages with at least 5-year industry experience.

  • You have developed enterprise systems (e.g. ERP, SCM, …) or Web Applications for complex business domains.

  • You have architecture experience and know how to design APIs and microservice based systems.

  • Your code is well tested and easily understood.

  • You follow a DevOps mindset. Experience with Cloud Computing platforms like Amazon AWS is a plus.

  • You like working in a team and you embrace agility.



You Benefit From

Community. Tech culture of trust and empowerment, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, +100 internal technical and fun guilds, tech talks, product demos, Coderdojos, parties, and events.

Perks. Competitive salary, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, public transport discounts, relocation assistance for internationals, free drinks, and fruits, hardware of your choice.

Development. Tour of Mastery, extensive onboarding, personal branding support, opportunity to attend and speak at data science conferences and Meetups, and encouragement to publish work.

Work Environment. Self-organized, autonomous teams and flexible working hours.

Scale. Unparalleled levels of data and opportunities.


Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!

If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring processes, please contact the Recruiter Rebecca Kurzbuch.

item.title: Salesforce Administrator (f/m) at Delivery Hero AG (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
Delivery Hero is building the next generation global online food-ordering platform. Our awesome international team already operates in over 40 countries worldwide to ensure hungry customers get to their favorite takeaway food the fastest way possible. The company has grown from its inception in 2011 to become the world's largest food-ordering network. This is an exciting time for Delivery Hero with a huge and rapid amount of growth in countries, market size and opportunities. Our ideal candidate will be enthusiastic, innovative and good at "getting things done." You will play an active role in our future - an exciting job and a workplace in the heart of Berlin is waiting for you!



Your mission:



  • You will be part of Delivery Hero Salesforce team, which is responsible globally for currently three Salesforce instances. Your focus will be on the foodora Salesforce instance, but you will be exposed to all levels of Salesforce work in a highly developed and functional team (Administrators, Product Managers, Developers, QA Specialists) with lots of career opportunities.

  • You will primarily focus on the administration of the foodora and Delivery Hero Salesforce CRM instance and the development of related processes; as well as be responsible for assisting with its adoption and ongoing success.

  • Administration functions include: user management, configuration, customisation, automation, report and dashboard development, data management, ticket management, training and support for AppExchange applications. Also functional testing (QA) of change requests and new features.

  • You will also be responsible for maintaining security such as user accounts, mobile user accounts, sharing rules, user roles, user profiles, field level security, content folder rights, groups, list view rights as well as the overall system configuration, change control, and enhancements

  • You will assist in developing and maintaining documentation on processes, policies, application configuration, and help related materials, as well as operational requests and troubleshoot issues whilst working with diverse user groups

  • You will manage mass imports/exports of data and instance to ensure data integrity

  • You will conduct training of Business Owners for new features and help with roll-out as well as present changes/system enhancements and overall training to diverse audiences

  • You will act as a point of contact for all of our Salesforce users and provide high quality support via ticket system or telephone queries



Your heroic skills:



  • 2 years of technical support for web-based applications.

  • 2 years of previous experience as a Salesforce Administrator.

  • S. or a B.A. college degree or commensurate work experience.

  • Working knowledge of relational databases design concepts and data management.

  • Solid understanding of Salesforce.

  • Proficiency with MS Office suite, especially Excel.

  • Analytical business process development skills and problem solving skills.

  • Ability to troubleshoot system, process and data issues.

  • Flexible team player attitude.



We offer you:



  • International working atmosphere and cross-cultural teams.

  • Flexible working hours.

  • Great career opportunities.

  • Safety of a large company: pension scheme and stability.

  • Nice work environment and English as working language.

GameDuell is one of the leading casual games companies in Germany located in the heart of Berlin. With more than 125 million users we are constantly looking for ways to improve our product and our players` experience. a10:author.a10:name: SAP HANA Platform & Database and HANA Vora

item.title: (Senior) Machine Learning Developer for Leonardo Machine Learning Applications J at SAP HANA Platform & Database and HANA Vora (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
SAP’s vision is to help the world run better and improve people’s lives.


As the cloud company powered by SAP HANA®, SAP is a market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and industries run better. SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. SAP applications and services enable our customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.


At SAP, we believe in the power of collaboration and empower our employees to perform at their best in an environment that encourages free and open expression of ideas. You’ll work alongside creative thinkers who share your interests, while turning big ideas into reality for our customers. With innovative job training, mentors to help you grow, and the flexibility to balance your work and personal life, you’ll be able to get more out of your career. It’s no wonder that some of the sharpest minds from around the world are working for a company that is consistently recognized as a global top employer.


Now it’s your turn to take the next step and help make the world Run Simple.



PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES



The SAP Innovation Center Network is a strategic innovation entity within SAP, combining software engineering excellence with thought leadership and entrepreneurial spirit. Across various focus clusters and by building on strong teams, we pioneer game-changing solutions in close collaboration with startups, customers & partners in industry and research as well as with other SAP units. To ensure a successful go-to-market, we follow an end-to-end responsibility approach. By exploring unconventional ideas and developing inspiring proofs of concepts, we push the state-of-the-art in computer science and its applied fields to provide SAP with foresight into future trends. 



As a (Senior) Machine Learning Developer, you will work with an expert team in a startup-like environment focusing on building of new, cloud-based solutions as part of the SAP Leonardo Machine Learning portfolio. Your primary goal will be to build from ground up end to end machine learning solution. You are a self-starter, lean startup-minded, and born for life in fast paced environments. As an ideal candidate, you have built cloud-based data processing systems which scale vertically and horizontally to support millions of transactions per second. You will have the chance to work in a free-thinking environment with a single purpose – to delight and amaze our users.



EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS



As part of the SAP Innovation Center Network team, you will help us research and create applications that empower businesses. You will be working in a fast-paced environment, communicating and collaborating with designers, software engineers, and product managers, as well as our partners and customers.




  • Work through user given problems from beginning to end: translating research insight into adequate concepts for SAP’s customers.

  • Model complex sets of data in ways that are easy to comprehend: Create information & software architecture, interaction models, screens designs and fine grained details of user & software interactions.

  • Own the success or failure of your work and collaborate with other designers, developers, and customers on the feasibility of ideas.

  • Sketch and prototype ideas to test viability and how interactions feel.

  • Develop the proposed solution end to end with the team

  • Work together with customers & stakeholders to determine solution ideas and to validate the proposed solution

  • Desirability of your solutions and appealing end-user UIs are core driving principals for everything you develop

  • Immerse yourself quickly into new topics, terminology and end user tasks.



EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES



Required



  • Master or Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Operations Research or related field

  • Track record of developing novel machine and deep learning algorithms and systems. Motivation to keep up to date with latest research.

  • Proficiency in handling of multi-terabyte datasets in distributed Linux/Unix environments

  • Experience with Machine / Deep Learning software packages such as Caffe/Torch/Theano/TensorFlow

  • Experience in data analysis to get tangible information form the data. Ability to visualize data and present core insights in a clear and compelling way.

  •  Strong desire to overcome obstacles and make your work benefit SAP's customers

  • Excellent English language skills



Preferred



  • Track record of prior work experience or internships in the area of software engineering or data sciences.

  • Knowledge in the area of ERP and business applications

  • Self starter and team player who can deeply collaborate with team members and stakeholders




WORK EXPERIENCE


2+ years of academic of practical experience in deep learning / machine learning / data sciences with a focus on innovation



LOCATION


Walldorf



EXPECTED TRAVEL


0 - 10%








SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT



To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.

a10:author.a10:name: SAP HANA Platform & Database and HANA Vora

item.title: Senior Cloud Developer/Development Expert for Leonardo Machine Learning Applicat at SAP HANA Platform & Database and HANA Vora (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
SAP’s vision is to help the world run better and improve people’s lives.


As the cloud company powered by SAP HANA®, SAP is a market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and industries run better. SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. SAP applications and services enable our customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.


At SAP, we believe in the power of collaboration and empower our employees to perform at their best in an environment that encourages free and open expression of ideas. You’ll work alongside creative thinkers who share your interests, while turning big ideas into reality for our customers. With innovative job training, mentors to help you grow, and the flexibility to balance your work and personal life, you’ll be able to get more out of your career. It’s no wonder that some of the sharpest minds from around the world are working for a company that is consistently recognized as a global top employer.


Now it’s your turn to take the next step and help make the world Run Simple.


PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES
 
The SAP Innovation Center Network is a strategic innovation entity within SAP, combining software engineering excellence with thought leadership and entrepreneurial spirit. Across various focus clusters and by building on strong teams, we pioneer game-changing solutions in close collaboration with startups, customers & partners in industry and research as well as with other SAP units. To ensure a successful go-to-market, we follow an end-to-end responsibility approach. By exploring unconventional ideas and developing inspiring proofs of concepts, we push the state-of-the-art in computer science and its applied fields to provide SAP with foresight into future trends.



As a (Senior) Cloud Developer for SAP Leonardo Machine Learning applications, you will work with an expert team in a startup-like environment focusing on building of new, cloud-based solutions as part of the SAP Leonardo Machine Learning portfolio. Your primary goal will be to build from ground up end to end machine learning solution. You are a self-starter, lean startup-minded, and born for life in fast paced environments. As an ideal candidate, you have built cloud-based data processing systems which scale vertically and horizontally to support millions of transactions per second. You will have the chance to work in a free-thinking environment with a single purpose – to delight and amaze our users.
 
EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS
 
You will work very close together with a team of dedicated experts including frontend developers and architects with a single goal of designing beautiful and disruptive cloud-based machine learning solutions.



Your tasks include:



  • Build our distributed, microservices-based data processing infrastructure

  • Provide support for both batch-based and stream-based data processing

  • Ensure responsiveness, scalability, and maintain sub-second end-to-end latency

  • Focus on software fault-tolerance to compensate for inevitable outages in the cloud

  • Closely communicate with front developers to achieve perfect separation of concerns

  • Make and take full responsibility of strategic decisions regarding cloud software development


 
EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
 
Required



  • Master’s degree or similar in operating/distributed systems or related field

  • Proven track record in development of scalable cloud-based data processing systems

  • Expert knowledge of cloud infrastructure services (OpenStack, Docker, Cloud Foundry, AWS ELB)

  • Expert knowledge of database and streaming systems (Hadoop/Spark/Flink/Kafka/Redis/Cassandra)

  • Expert knowledge of modern protocols and APIs (Protobufs/Thrift/REST/JSON/Cap'n Proto)

  • Deep knowledge in integrating systems running in different environments

  • Experience working in continuous delivery and continuous deployment enabled setups

  • Experience in leading and driving software development projects

  • Excellent English communication and language skills


 
Preferred



  • Experience with libraries, frameworks, and toolkits for multivariate testing

  • Knowledge of cloud-related fault-tolerance issues and their system implications

  • German communication and language skills


 
WORK EXPERIENCE



  • At least 4 years of professional work experience with a compelling portfolio of running systems.


SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT


To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist / Data Science Expert - Deep Learning Center of Excellence at SAP HANA Platform & Database and HANA Vora (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
As you know, SAP’s vision is to help the world run better and improve people’s lives.


As THE cloud company powered by SAP HANA®, SAP is a market leader in enterprise application software, helping companies of all sizes and industries Run Simple.


We empower people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. SAP applications and services enable our customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably.


At SAP, we believe in the power of collaboration and empower our employees to perform at their best in an environment that encourages free and open expression of ideas. Here, you work alongside creative thinkers who share your interests, while turning big ideas into reality for our customers. With innovative job training, mentors to help you grow, and the flexibility to balance your work and personal life, you’re able to build your career. It’s no wonder that some of the sharpest minds from around the world are working for a company that is consistently recognized as a global top employer.



As a Senior Data Scientist / Data Science Expert for the SAP Deep Learning Center of Excellence, you will work within a team of data engineers and developers solving real-world problems by building new, cloud based machine learning solutions and services. Our use cases span commerce, finance, procurement, logistics, and travel. You will work against fixed timelines and your success will be measured by the ability to deliver production-grade machine learning models reaching accuracies on par with top notch research prototypes.



EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS


Your tasks include:



  • Push the frontiers of what is possible in the area of Machine Learning working with real data

  • Explore, understand, and implement most recent machine learning algorithms and approaches

  • Comfortably handle very large data sets in scale-up and scale-out cloud environments

  • Fulfill both functional and non-functional (availability, throughput, latency) requirements

  • Understand business processes which create and consume data so as to be able to select best approaches, evaluate their performance, and asses business relevance

  • Create excellence both in terms of results quality and system scalability through continuous evaluation, analysis, and refinement

  • Communicate the relevance of implemented systems and achieved results in a visual and consistent way



EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES


You are a self-starter, goal-oriented, striving for perfection engineer. As an ideal candidate, you will demonstrate a proven track record in development of large-scale machine learning pipelines and combine it with curiosity for exploring of new use cases and applications of machine learning to domains spanning processing of structured and unstructured data.



Required skills & qualifications:



  • Master degree in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Physics or related field

  • Track record of developing productive machine learning-based solutions and/or systems

  • Proficiency in working with very large datasets in distributed Linux/Unix environments

  • Experience with Python and Machine Learning software packages such as scikit-learn or TensorFlow 

  • Experience with data and error analysis and ability to present core insights in a clear and compelling way

  • Team spirit and desire to overcome obstacles and make your work benefit SAP's customers

  • Excellent English language skills



WORK EXPERIENCE


At least 5 years of relevant experience in deep learning / machine learning / data science development projects with a focus on innovation.



LOCATION


Berlin area, Germany



EXPECTED TRAVEL


0 - 30%


The position can be filled as part time position.



SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT 



To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.

item.title: Engineering Lead - Pricing & Forecasting (Java/ Scala/ Python) at Zalando SE (Berlin, Deutschland)
item.description:
The Opportunity

Zalando is transforming from Europe's leading e-commerce company into a multi-service platform for fashion. From logistics to big brands, to manufacturers - we're building the platform that connects all people and parts of the fashion ecosystem.

Pricing & Forecasting is at the core of our commercial operation. Our tools help to determine how much of each product to buy, to recommend the best prices for these products, and to ensure that we have the right level of logistics capacity to fulfill customer demand. The Pricing and Forecasting engineering team uses cutting edge technology to forecast demand and pricing with focus on business and customer experience. Partnerships happen with all key engineering and product teams, business and customer experience teams.

You will have the opportunity to lead a team of talented data scientists and developers, to plan and deliver in an agile way, to develop the technical strategy to build robust platforms aligned with business, the freedom to launch your own open source projects, speak at conferences and strengthen your personal brand while receiving meaningful support at
every step.

Your Role



  • Developing and executing the mid- & long-term technical vision and architecture with your teams

  • Help your teams to find the right solution for complex problems by guiding them

  • Keep a close connection to Product Owners / Product Specialists and be a sparring partner when creating the product vision

  • Define Objectives and Key Results with your team to achieve a high-level alignment on a quarter-year basis

  • Facilitate communication and decision-making between teams and stakeholders

  • Coach and develop team members in technical questions

  • Identify and share your knowledge of state-of- the-art technologies

  • Represent Zalando at conferences and meetups, give technical talks and help to recruit great technical talent


What We Are Looking For



  • Significant experience (min. 8+ years) in web and backend technology concepts, agile development methodologies and team leadership (min. 2+ years)

  • Up to date on current trends in software design, architecture and web services

  • Skilled in object-oriented and functional programming languages like Java / Scala / Python (with relevant frameworks) as well as (No)SQL databases

  • Knowledge of event-based systems and event queues, in general, is a plus

  • Passion for well structured, readable and testable code

  • Experienced engineer who knows about scalability, high-availability, security, monitoring, architecture & design of state-of- the-art websites and the systems that drive them

  • Profound knowledge of REST APIs and highly distributed, scalable and resilient microservice landscapes

  • Experience with designing and operating large-scale applications on a PaaS/SaaS cloud, preferably AWS


MANAGEMENT AND LEADERSHIP SKILLS



  • Experiences in building, developing and managing a team of engineers in an agile environment

  • You can lead projects and groups, including managing complex projects with various stakeholders through the whole company

  • You feel comfortable in coaching teams and finding the best possible solution

  • Ability to work cross-functionally with other teams, and to solve conflicts

  • You think creatively, are solution oriented, and continuously innovate

  • For your area of responsibility, you craft a technical vision that aligns well with the overall technology vision

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills and English language fluency


You Benefit From

Culture. A culture of trust, empowerment and feedback, 100+ internal guilds, tech talks, product demos, coder dojos.

Community. Tech culture of trust and empowerment, open-source commitment, meetups, game nights, +100 internal technical and fun guilds, tech talks, product demos, Coderdojos, parties, and events.

Perks. Competitive salary, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, public transport discounts, relocation assistance for internationals, free drinks and fruit, and the hardware of your choice.

Development. Tour of Mastery, extensive onboarding, personal branding support, opportunity to attend and speak at data science conferences and Meetups, and encouragement to publish work.

Work Environment. Self-organized, autonomous teams and flexible working hours.

Scale. Unparalleled levels of data and opportunities.

Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!!

If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring processes, please contact our recruiter Rebecca Kurzbuch.

you:

item.title: Android Developer (m/f) at Blinkist (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
This ad goes out to all those who want to find a purpose in what they’re doing and take accountability for their work.


At Blinkist, we’ve created a meaningful product that is growing fast. Our blinks – key insights from the world’s best nonfiction – help more than 2 million people around the globe to keep learning new, exciting things each and every day.


In 2017, our app received the World Summit Award, granted by the United Nations, in the Learning & Education category. 


Why do we need you?


Blinkist is growing quickly and we are looking for an Android Developer to help accelerate our ability to deliver a top-notch product to our users. This is where you come in. You will ship features that affect million of users and revenue while playing with the latest technologies – our minSdkVersion is 16 – Jelly Bean.


As one of our Android developers you will:


Take responsibility in driving the Blinkist Android App from day 1




  • Implement new features & polish the app by increasing stability, fixing bugs and thinking about the user experience




  • Interact closely with designers & product managers to propose Android-suitable solutions




  • Conduct code reviews and participate in regular standups to ensure quality and alignment 




To do this, we believe you should have:




  • 3+ years of Android specific development experience




  • Strong experience with RxJava and testing (Espresso, JUnit)




  • Some experience with Kotlin would be a plus




  • Familiarity with Dagger and Gradle




  • Passion for writing clean architecture and easily-testable code




  • Be keen to work with best-practice agile development methods and to increase the team's effectiveness with each release




What’s in it for you?


At Blinkist, we offer a fantastic workplace in the heart of Berlin-Neukölln including all the benefits you’d expect – from a personalized perk system to free drinks, fresh fruit, and furious foosball fights, plus the nicest, smartest bunch of coworkers. Add a competitive salary, flexible working hours, and a meaningful product on the rise, and you have a first impression of why Blinkist is a great place to work.


We got rid of classical management hierarchies and, instead, distributed authority among all colleagues. We foster a unique company culture championing self-empowerment, personal development, direct communication and mutual support. Not only do we want you to grow into the role of Android Developer, but we want this role to grow with you.


If we’ve captured your interest and you want to be part of a rapidly-growing, popular and valuable product, apply now and let us know why you’re the perfect fit for the job!

item.title: iOS Deleveper at Rocket Enterprise Solutions GmbH (Berlin, Deutschland)
item.description:
If you want to be part of a small developer team that creates an amazing mobile app for insurance
companies across Europe, this is the right job for you! Our mother company is one of the largest
service providers in Germany in this sector. You will be one of the first members of a new team to
quickly prototype new ideas and features for our existing projects (iOS and HTML5).


Why do we need you?
We are growing quickly and looking for mid-level and senior iOS Developers to help accelerate our ability to deliver a top-notch product to our customers. As one of our iOS developers, you will:



  • Be responsible for developing our existing app and move it to the next level

  • Provide second level support to our customers

  • Assure a high quality and robust code base



Skills & Requirements
We assume that you have several years of relevant professional programming experience, however
individuals with talent will always be considered.



Skills required:



  • 2+ years iOS development experience in a professional environment and ideally also web development

  • A deep understanding in Swift

  • Ideally good German

  • Passion, Motivation and a keen interest to learn new things and constantly evolve


What we can offer you:



  • A team of professionals with a flat hierarchy and what passionately believes in what it does.

  • Responsibility and space to make your own decisions

  • An innovative and interesting product

  • An attractive salary from 50-70 k, depending on skills

  • 30 days paid vacation

  • An opportunity to be part of a growing company, directly influencing its success

  • A stylish office in the heart of Berlin, opportunity to occasionally work from home

  • Attractive workplace with state-of- the art equipment

  • Free drinks, fresh fruits and snacks

  • Awesome teambuilding activities



We offer you a fantastic workplace in the heart of Berlin with all the advantages you expect. From free drinks, fresh fruit and snacks to the nicest employees. Add flexible working hours, a competitive salary and a meaningful product and you get a first impression of why we are a great employer.



If we´ve captured your interest, apply now and let us know why you are the perfect fit for the job.

item.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer for Germany's real-estate market leader at Scout24 (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
The commercial team is the market segment of ImmobilienScout24 that focuses on the real estate needs of companies & businesses. Your work and decisions will have a direct impact on thousands of customers and the company’s success. We are a cross-functional team responsible for helping companies to find a great new office space for their employees, funky locations for the next trendy bar or restaurant development, high impact retail locations and any other real estate to help their businesses succeed.


We value an entrepreneurial mind, openness, adaptability, being polyglot, not being afraid to take risks, ownership & responsibility. You will develop the team from technical perspective, make technical decisions, coach the team and guide them to the right technical direction.


What we need from you:



  • You build it, you run it! Develop, test and operate with your cross-functional team high-quality software for the commercial consumers and customers

  • Participate in architectural discussions, regularly propose and discuss solutions to a system or product.

  • Work with other engineers to align and propose technical solutions for problems.

  • Participate in hiring process, help attracting and retaining great talent.

  • Support and develop other Software Engineers by providing advice and mentoring.

  • Work closely with your product owner and challenge them in product initiatives and strategy.

  • Continuously improve the tools your team develops with in a lean product development mindset.


What we need you to bring:



  • You are an engineer at heart. Proficiency in modern backend programming - preferred in the Java stack (we use Spring Boot for our services)

  • Experience with modern frontend programming with JavaScript frameworks like AngularJS, Node.js and React.js/Redux  and HTML5, CSS3/SCSS/SaSS 

  • Have knowledge of cloud environments (our Docker containers are running on AWS) and cloud based architectures (IaaS/PaaS).

  • Knowledge of prevalent build tools, such as Maven, Grunt, Gulp, Webpack and Node Package Manager.

  • Knows best practice in clean code, test driven development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.

  • Bring some years of experience working in multi-disciplinary and multi-culture teams.

  • Prefer to prove your ideas by trying them and measuring their impact. You accept failure is part of that process.

  • Strong commitment to agility and an agile mindset.

  • Fluency in English.

item.title: Senior JavaScript Engineer (A/B testing, Analytics, Data Processing) at Zalando SE (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
Zalando's Product Analytics department was established in 2016 to strengthen and support a data-driven culture and decision making by providing dedicated analysts to the teams, facilitating trainings and knowledge exchange. We aim to provide state of the art A/B testing, tracking data collection and analysis services. You can become a member of the engineering forces of Product Analytics department.


Our tracking services already collect and process more than 60+ billion monthly tracking hits and more than a trillion single pieces of information about our web and app users. Our A/B testing enablement service is one of the most heavily loaded with the plans of getting 10x load in the next year. Our process monitoring and process mining services are adding features rapidly and will become the bases for the journey modelling and attribution services already in 2017. All this infrastructure and services, are the key for our goal to make Zalando a truly data-driven company.


Tens of Zalando web development teams are rolling out, measuring efficiency, and monitoring performance of dozens of new features on our own Zalando Web Store and Zalando Apps daily. Simplicity of integration of our A/B testing and tracking services is key to Zalando's ability to continuously move fast and try out new approaches and ideas. You will be responsible for enabling web and mobile integration of our A/B testing and tracking services within Zalando's various development teams.


Your profile



  • Deep understanding of Web Browser technologies

  • JavaScript is the language you think, you are fluent in using and applying concepts like asynchronous programming, closures, types, and ES6.

  • Experience in writing JavaScript API frameworks

  • Passion and ability to ship high quality software on time

  • Strong computer science and algorithmic background

  • Excellent communication skills and fluent spoken and written English


Nice to have



  • Experience/understanding of Web tracking integration frameworks

  • Experience with A/B testing, analytics, data processing

  • Knowledge of Web debugging tools: DevTools, Charles, Fiddler

  • Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues

  • Good understanding of communication protocols like IP, TCP, HTTPS

  • Understanding of authentication and authorization practices

  • Knowledge of Kubernetes, Mesos or other resource scheduling frameworks

  • AWS knowledge

  • Good understanding of basic data structures and fundamental algorithms/complexity, design patterns, object-oriented design and analysis


You benefit from:



  • Culture. Culture of trust and empowerment, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, +70 internal technical and fun guilds, tech talks, product demos, Coderdojos, parties & events.

  • Diversity. You will join a multinational team of passionate engineers of 10+ nationalities speaking 8 human languages

  • Perks. Competitive salary, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, public transport discounts, relocation assistance for internationals, free drinks & fruits, hardware of your choice.

  • Development. Tour of Mastery, extensive onboarding, personal branding support, opportunity to attend and speak at conferences. You will be in contact with opinion leaders in diverse topics of software development.

  • Work Environment. Self-organized,  autonomous teams and flexible working hours.


WANT TO JOIN US? THEN GO AHEAD AND APPLY!!


If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring processes, please contact recruiter Taryn Bonugli

item.title: Ruby Team Lead (m/f) at askCharlie GmbH (Berlin, Deutschland)
item.description:
Our backend systems mainly use Rails/Ruby, PostgreSQL and run on AWS. We do not have monolithic architecture but we went for a service-oriented architecture from the very beginning.


askCharlie’s Frontend is built with modern Javascript. In addition to our web applications, we are increasing focus on the development of APIs for our frontend and mobile applications.



Your responsibilties



  • Lead an agile development team

  • Maintain, further develop and scale our platform

  • Follow and further develop our engineering principles and standards of clean code, efficiency and maintainability

  • Promote and encourage technical, business and people related initiatives that improve productivity, performance, and quality

item.title: Senior JavaScript Engineer - (HTML/CSS, React, Angular/Angular 2 or Node) at Zalando SE (Berlin, Germany)
item.description:
You Are Ready To Make An Impact


Zalando is transforming from Europe’s leading e-commerce company into a multi-service platform for fashion. From Fashion Store to Brand Solutions to Business Assurance and Smart Logistics, you will be building the technologies that are utilized as a base for further products and aim to connect all people and parts of the fashion ecosystem.


We live Radical Agility - a software development methodology that allows engineers to get work done while management keeps their distance. Along with our guiding set of principles - Autonomy, Mastery, Purpose - we entrust you and your team to shape the future of Zalando.


Your individual impact at Zalando is limitless. It is not only about growth and improvement, it is about inventing new things. We strongly believe that providing useful code to the world is a virtue.Along with you, we strive to learn from and contribute to open source software for the betterment of Zalando and the tech community.


You Are Setting Standards


Variety. As part of your onboarding, you will get to know some and join one of our teams that matches your interests and skills. As a team, you will build, scale and continuously improve a variety of web applications that redefine the user experience of our customers and partners.


Autonomy. Based on our microservices architecture, you and your team will own your code. You will decide together on the technologies and tools to utilize as well operate large-scale web applications on PaaS/SaaS cloud (AWS).


Purpose. You and your team will work truly cross-functional with an entrepreneurial mindset and drive the whole development cycle according to its purpose - from implementation to testing and maintenance.


Mastery. You will join a team that is dedicated to delivering the highest standards when it comes to the scalability, performance and user-centricity of our software. You will add value through innovation by leveraging current trends in software design, frameworks and RESTful web services.


Skills & Requirements


You Are Skilled


Technologies. In working hands-on with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, modern libraries (eg. React) and frameworks (eg. Angular/Angular 2 or Ember). Check our Tech Radar for more information on the technologies we use.


Code Quality. In writing high-performance, reusable code and using version control systems.


Feature Development. In delivering bug free and fully functional features and products that are well tested and based on user requirements.


Knowledge Exchange. In contributing to our growing frontend community and becoming part of our internal Web Guild.


You Are Offered


Culture. Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, +70 internal technical and fun guilds, tech talks, product demos, Coder Dojos, parties & events.


Perks. Competitive salary, subvention of your occupational pension plan, 40% Zalando shopping discount, public transport discounts, relocation assistance for internationals as well as help with kindergarten and schools, free drinks & fruits, hardware of your choice, family rooms


Development. Tour of Mastery, extensive onboarding, personal branding support, opportunity to attend and speak at conferences.


Work Environment. Self-organized, autonomous teams and flexible working hours.


Want to join us? Then go ahead and apply!!


If you need guidance or have any questions about our hiring processes, please contact recruiter Matthias Rempel, Matthias Schmeißer or Antonia Samanns.
